name: glasses_add_remove

backward: Remove the glasses from the person

backward: Remove the hat from the person

backward: Remove the wooden chair from the image

backward: Remove the red ball from the image

name: coffee_cup_add_remove

name: horizontal_flip
forward: Flip the image horizontally (mirror)
backward: Flip the image horizontally (mirror)

name: rotate_90_cw
forward: Rotate the image 90 degrees clockwise
backward: Rotate the image 90 degrees counter-clockwise

backward: Remove the beard from the person
